name: Spinach Cheese Ball
author: SARAHB2
summary: This recipe is a take off of the popular spinach dip, however in a different form. This is a great addition to your holiday open house table.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry
1 (4 ounce) can water chestnuts, drained and chopped
1 (.4 ounce) packet dry vegetable soup mix
directions: In a large bowl, mix together the spinach, cream cheese, water chestnuts, vegetable soup mix, mayonnaise and Cheddar cheese until well blended
Form into a ball, and roll in chopped walnuts
If the mixture is too soft to form a ball, refrigerate for about 30 minutes to set
Wrap the cheese ball in plastic wrap, and refrigerate overnight to blend the flavors before serving with your favorite crackers
